title: Twisted Treeline Queue
body:
Can we please just have a constant Twisted Treeline normal queue, personally I would love ranked but would settle for normal at this point. It was up for a few hours today and I enjoyed every moment of playing it. After playing for 5 years Summoners Rift has become pretty stale for me.

I understand the fact that we don't have enough people playing to support it, allegedly, however if people don't mind waiting in queue for 10-15 minutes, such as myself, I believe we should at least be able to play the game modes that are supported in other regions.

Thanks.
